title: Randomly kicked out of promos
body:
I got into promos for silver, won one, lost one, won one, lost one then deciding to stop playing ranked for the night only to come back on today and see I somehow lost promos even without playing the 5th game or losing 3 so what the hell is going on? I KNOW FOR A FACT I did not complete my promo games and my match history can prove this. I want to know what happened and what Riot plans on doing to correct this.

FIX IT.

replies.body:
As *Lew* mentioned, any sort of dodging or your client disconnecting (which counts as a dodge if in champ select) counts as a loss during your promo series.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
Yes but if we get disconnected from pvp for no reason and loose promos because of this it's annoying and SOOOOOO frustrating
Did you dodge  a game while you were in the promo series? It is also possible that the series expired if you took too long to finish it.
